application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 3 (Materials), 5 (Construction Method Statement) 6 (Cycle Parking) and 7 (Refuse) of planning permission 18/14028/FUL (Erection of two additional storeys to create a five storey building to provide 2 no. one bedroom flats and 4no. two bedroom flats with balconies. Alterations to existing building to include addition of balconies to first and second floor flats and rendering of existing elevations)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: DISIA Name: New Malden District Centre Inset Area
ART4 Name: New Malden District Centre Inset Area
NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Highways and Transport

decision_conditions: Due to insufficient information submitted for Condition 5 (Construction Method Statement) of planning permission 18/14028/FUL the proposal fails to demonstrate that the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers would be safeguarded, or that highway safety and the free flow of traffic would be maintained in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
